example.code:
PS C:\> Get-ELBLoadBalancer | format-table -property LoadBalancerName
LoadBalancerName ---------------- my-load-balancer my-other-load-balancer my-internal-load-balancer
example.description: This example lists the names of your load balancers.
This example describes the specified load balancer.
This example describes all your load balancers in the current AWS region.
This example describes all your load balancers across all available AWS regions.
